Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 8 Nīvaraṇagocchaka » 8.5 Nīvaraṇanīvaraṇasampayuttaduka » 8.5.7 Pañhāvāra » 8.5.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 8.5.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Nīvaraṇagocchaka
Nīvaraṇanīvaraṇasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
106.
2119Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
<< 8.5.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
